metadata.title: Gleim Flight Computer E6B
features: Standard E6B computer for easy use
Made from popular, durable fiberboard for longevity
description: The Gleim Flight Computer E6B is a standard E6B flight computer made of durable fiberboard. Includes speed, time, and distance computations, along with temperature and other conversions that all pilots need to know in cross-country flight planning. This computer also includes a crosswind component graph, a Flight Plan Sequence Checklist, and Special Equipment Suffixes for daily flying.

title: Sporty's Electronic E6B Flight Computer for pilots
